Producer: David Thion, Justin Taurand, Philippe Martin
Screenwriter: Katell Quillévéré, Gilles Taurand, Maylis De Kerangal
Production Co: CN5 Productions, France 2 Cinéma, Ezekiel Film Production, RTBF, Les Films du Bélier, Frakas Productions, Les Films Pelléas, Mars Films, Proximus, Jouror Films
Synopsis: The intersecting lives of teens on a surfing trip, a woman with a weak heart and two teams of doctors and medical experts.
Title: Heal the Living
